long_description: Stretchy, moisture-wicking and ready for your local running path or gym routine, the men's Salomon Float shorts are designed to help you reach your next fitness goal. Lightweight fabric and liner shorts wick moisture and dry quickly. Drawcord waist personalizes the fit and 2 zippered pockets stash accessories. 12 in. inseam offers modest coverage. Salomon Float Shorts for men offer a relaxed fit.
short_description: Stretchy, moisture-wicking and ready for your local running path or gym routine, the men's Salomon Float shorts are designed to help you reach your next fitness goal.
